author.bio: Web application security and accessibility evangelist. Software instructor. Conference lecturer and presenter.

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable WordPress Plugins Report for the Weeks of September 1 through September 14, 2018
wordpressPost.excerpt: Vulnerable Plugins Apologies for not sending out a report last week. There were seven disclosures over the last two weeks, with two issues unfixed. View this week's vulnerable plugins list....
wordpressPost.content:
Vulnerable Plugins

Apologies for not sending out a report last week. There were seven disclosures over the last two weeks, with two issues unfixed.

View this week’s vulnerable plugins list.

WordPress News

The roadmap for version 4.9.9 was released earlier this week. The schedule currently proposes 4.9.9 being released during the first week of November.  In addition to bug fixes, 4.9.9 will include features/updates around internationalization, accessibility, servehappy, and gutenberg preparation.  Given this isn’t a purely maintenance release, you’ll want to begin plans for additional testing before deploying to production.
